content:
The chunk consists of two essential import statements required for the implementation of the `DirectCheckBox` class. These imports are located at the very top of the document and provide necessary dependencies from the `direct.gui.DirectGui` module (including `DGG` constants and `DirectButton`) and the `panda3d.core` module (`PGButton`).

from direct.gui.DirectGui import DGG, DirectButton
from panda3d.core import PGButton
